text: "Stages" is a 1986 song by ZZ Top and is the second single from their ninth studio album Afterburner. It went to number 21 in the United States, number 43 in the United Kingdom, number 23 in Ireland, number 40 in New Zealand, number 63 in Australia and number 42 in Canada. ==Formats and track listings== * 7-inch single (United States) # "Stages" – 3:32 # "Can't Stop Rockin'" – 3:01 * 12-inch single (United States) # "Stages" (extended version) – 5:05 # "Stages" – 3:32 # "Hi Fi Mama" – 2:22 ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Stages (song)
